data.event: The community was founded in about 1887.

event.title: was filed at Jackson, Missouri, on January 1, 1859

data.event: The claim was filed at Jackson, Missouri, on January 1, 1859.
In 1887 they granted the Current River branch of the Frisco Railroad a right-of-way across their land in Carter County.
By July 3, 1888, the tracks were laid and the first train ran through the new town.

event.title: was submitted to the county on July 10, 1888

data.event: The plat for the town was submitted to the county on July 10, 1888.
